Global and Local: Agenda 2030 - Awareness Raising for Elderly

description.narrative: UFF will implement a communication-oriented project in collaboration with Finnish Pensioners' Federation. The purpose of the project is to increase the knowledge and understanding of sustainable development goals and challenges in Finland and in developing countries among the elderly citizens. Considering the size of the target group - pensioners in Finland - there has been only little focus on them when it comes to becoming global citizens and aware of SDGs.The more specific themes (Agenda 2030 and Finland 's development cooperation policy) and the focus of the communication will be finalized in the beginning of the project because the idea is to engage the beneficiaries in identifying the topics that are most relevant and meaningful for them while ensuring that the elements of Development Cooperation Policy and developing countries are taken into account. In addition the project contributes to the achievement of SDG 4.7 by increasing the skills of elderly in the spirit of lifelong learning and leave no one b ehind.The long-term impact is that the concepts of global citizenship or SDG principles is reflected in the mission of Finnish Pensioners' Federation. The immediate outcome of the project is Increased awareness and understanding of Agenda 2030 and Finland' s Development Policy among the members of the Federation.The project will reach directly up to 125.000 members of the Federation. The geographical scope is wide including 20 regional branches and 399 local organizations. Member organizations can be found w ithin the axis between Uusimaa and Lapland as well as North Karelia and Ostrobothnia. Only the Region of Aland is not covered.The key activies and events are:1. Baseline and endline survey about the knowledge and awareness of global citizenship2. Introduct ion to Agenda 2030 and development cooperation policy articles will be published in EL-Sanomat which is the newsletter for members.3. To communicate via Federation's blog4. To communicate via podcasts and social media accounts of the Federation and UFF5. O ne event in each of the 20 Regions to increase awareness and a presentation in Annual General Assembly in Tampere.
